page.title: 01Living in Tolworth.
page.content: My home area is quite near the bypass and the Hogsmill runs through it. I live in Tolworth, its main buildings are Tolworth Tower and Charrington Bowl. The Bowling alley brings alot of people to Tolworth, as it is one of the largest in Europe. It is, also, near to Chessington with it's famous zoo. Tolworth itself is quite quiet, despite the traffic going through the bypass from and to London. Tolworth Broadway is the popular place for shopping. The tall Tolworth Tower stands out as the landmark here. The bypass separates one half of Tolworth from the other. Our school is on the north side and is larger. I live on the south side. Bus services to Kingston, where there are big shops, are very frequent. There is,also, a railway service to London. { By Faye Windmill.}
